letters.description: Evaluate the client's overall system, identifying areas of restriction, tension, and asymmetry through observation and palpation.
Engage in attentive, non-judgmental listening to the body's inherent wisdom and subtle cues, allowing it to guide the therapeutic process.
Gently introduce therapeutic techniques to facilitate the release of restrictions and promote fluid movement within the craniosacral system.
Support the body's natural capacity to integrate changes and restore balance, fostering a sense of wholeness and well-being.
Empower the client with tools and strategies to cultivate resilience and maintain optimal health in the long term.
